title: Price equals ATC, stay in business

content.question: For a perfectly competitive firm producing the profit-maximizing quantity, the average total cost is $10 and the average variable cost is $8. If the market price for its product is $10, which of the following is true for the firm?

choices.label: It is sustaining a loss and should shut down.
It is earning zero economic profit and will remain in business.
Its accounting profits exceed implicit costs.
It will temporarily shut down until price rises.
It is making an economic profit that will attract other firms to the industry.

content.answer: It is earning zero economic profit and will remain in business.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
